Jane Austen Movies Quiz
Jane Austen\'s only 7 novels are the base of, or inspired many movies and TV films and series, so she is one of the writers with the most credits on IMDB, slightly behind i.e. Hemingway. The world she created and the problems faced by her characters in her works are living with us for almost 200 years in the sense that her stories and characters had born again in many movies played today.\nBehind the romantic or ironic stories and before the happy endings the fear or being marginalized, isolated or falling behind socially, culturally or economically is always present in her characters\' lives, so maybe this is why our era can find inspiration in her works. However this quiz is only about the movies, not the social aspects of the stories.
